long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually editing your cover letter for every company you apply to? This tool parses uploaded templates and allows you to fill them out with selected text from your current tab

Notes
- Text you want to be templated in your cover letter should be surrounded by %t, e.g. %tCompany%t
- Your files are stored solely in chrome session storage, which means they're cleared as soon as you close your browser
- If you include %tDate%t (case sensitive) in your template, it will be prefilled with the current date

Features
- Never forget text you meant to replace again!  The tool ensures that you've replaced every templated target before allowing for file generation
- Hotkeys that allow you to cycle between template targets and select highlighted text without ever having to open the extension popup
